thread.title: Is free parking period cancelled in Sharjah?
thread.title_full: Is free parking period cancelled in Sharjah?

title: Is free parking period cancelled in Sharjah?
text: Share Vote The Municipal council has recently approved the suggestion of cancelling the free parking period. The implementation of the decision of cancelling of free parking period which has recently approved by Sharjah municipal council has not been implemented by sharia municipality, said Attif Al Mazroui, Director of the parking department at Sharjah municipality. He said that the municipality are working to implement the decision but it's not yet executed and that the machines have not been activated yet. "When we decide to implement the decision we will announce it in a press conference to be attended by all means of media to convey the message to public." The Municipal council has recently approved the suggestion of cancelling the free parking period, as it helps motorists to find parking space during the afternoon time especially in vital areas. He said that the municipal council approved the recommendation because, it has been noticed that many motorists exploit the free parking time near commercial areas affecting shops' business. Afkar Abdullah
